prompts: Create a cute ice-type Pokemon with a playful personality and bright colors.
Imagine a small pink Pokemon that loves to dance and play in the snow.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with yellow hair and a sweet expression for a new game.
Show me a Pokemon inspired by a baby creature that enjoys cold environments.
Design a whimsical psychic-type Pokemon that has a soft and cuddly appearance.
Give me a description of a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and loves to socialize.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of ice and psychic types in a unique way.
